questions.subject: Mixed
questions.question: A sum of money doubles itself in 5 years at simple interest. In how many years will it become 8 times?
questions.explanation: If money doubles in 5 years, interest = principal. Rate = 100/5 = 20%. To become 8 times, interest needed = 7P. Time = (7P×100)/(P×20) = 35 years.

questions.subject: English
questions.question: Choose the correctly spelled word:
questions.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Occurrence' with double 'r' and double 'c'.
